discover.instruction: Read about what happened yesterday. Notice the highlighted verbs.
discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай о том, что произошло вчера. Обрати внимание на выделенные глаголы.

content.text: Yesterday was a busy day. I <highlight>woke up</highlight> early and <highlight>walked</highlight> to work. I <highlight>worked</highlight> all day. At lunch, I <highlight>called</highlight> my friend. We <highlight>talked</highlight> for 30 minutes. After work, I <highlight>cooked</highlight> dinner and <highlight>watched</highlight> TV. I <highlight>played</highlight> games for an hour. Then I <highlight>brushed</highlight> my teeth and <highlight>started</highlight> reading a book. I <highlight>finished</highlight> the day at 11 PM.
content.question: What ending do most of these verbs have? What time do they describe?
content.question_ru: Какое окончание у большинства этих глаголов? Какое время они описывают?

theory.title: Past Simple - Finished actions in the past
theory.title_ru: Past Simple - Завершённые действия в прошлом

points.example: work → worked, play → played, watch → watched
live → lived, dance → danced, like → liked
study → studied, try → tried, carry → carried

points.rule: Spelling: short vowel + consonant → double consonant + ed
points.rule_ru: Правописание: краткая гласная + согласная → удваиваем согласную
points.example: stop → stopped, plan → planned, travel → travelled
I didn't work. She didn't play.
Did you work? Did she play?

comparison_table.example: Yes, I did. / No, I didn't.

tasks.text: Last weekend, I visited my grandparents. I arrived at their house at 10 AM. We talked about many things. My grandmother cooked a delicious meal. I helped her in the kitchen. We played cards after lunch. I stayed until 6 PM. I hugged them goodbye and walked to the bus stop. I waited 10 minutes for the bus. I really enjoyed my visit.

produce.instruction_ru: Напиши о своих прошлых выходных, используя Past Simple.
prompts: What time did you wake up?
What did you do in the morning?
produce.example: Last weekend was great. I washed my clothes on Saturday morning. I cleaned my room too. In the afternoon, I walked in the park. I called my friend and we talked for an hour. On Sunday, I cooked pasta for lunch. I watched a movie in the evening. I really enjoyed my weekend.

input_flood.description: Read 5 texts with many regular Past Simple verbs.

texts.title: My Birthday
texts.content: Last Saturday was my birthday. I waked up early and opened my presents. My family decorated the house. My mom cooked a special breakfast. I invited my friends to a party. We danced and played games. Everyone laughed a lot. I received many gifts. My friends stayed until 10 PM. I thanked everyone for coming. It was a perfect day!

texts.title: The Interview
texts.content: Yesterday I attended a job interview. I prepared very well. I arrived 15 minutes early. I waited in the reception area. The interviewer asked many questions. I answered confidently. We discussed my experience. The interview lasted one hour. I thanked the interviewer. She promised to call me next week. I really hope I succeeded!

texts.title: Cooking Disaster
texts.content: I tried to cook dinner last night. I followed the recipe carefully. First, I washed the vegetables. I chopped them into pieces. I heated oil in a pan. But I burned the onions! I started again. This time I watched more carefully. The food turned out okay in the end. I learned an important lesson!

texts.title: Moving Day
texts.content: Last month I moved to a new apartment. I packed all my things into boxes. My friends helped me carry them. We loaded everything into a truck. We unloaded at the new place. I unpacked for hours. I arranged the furniture. I cleaned every room. I ordered pizza for my helpers. We all collapsed on the sofa, exhausted!

texts.title: First Day of School
texts.content: I remember my first day at university. I arrived early and looked for my classroom. I introduced myself to other students. The professor started the lesson on time. I listened carefully and noted everything. I asked a few questions. After class, I talked to some classmates. We exchanged phone numbers. I walked home feeling excited about my new life.
